projects.title: Growy
projects.description: Growy is a web app for the management of personal daily activities. Gamification elements were integrated to motivate the user to use the app. The app was developed in team as a final project of a coding bootcamp.

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description: A simple Pokedex to search information about your favourite Pokemon. This project was the assignement for the React Code Week given for the Edgemony bootcamp. I used the RESTful PokeAPI, fetching and processing the data that i needed to populate the Pokedex page. I also used Recharts library to show the stats of each Pokemon.

projects.title: ToDo List
projects.description: I made this ToDo list as an exercise to study React Redux (and to remind myself to fight my procrastination too :P)

projects.title: Frontend for streaming platform
projects.description: A frontend clone of the most famous streaming platform. I made this project as assignement for the first code week of the Edgemony bootcamp. The app is made in JavaScript and CSS. I used The Movie Database API to fetch the movie information.
